document.full_text: campbell soup co  reported a higher-than-expected quarterly profit on monday and forecast full-year results at the top of its range after moving its focus from profit-sapping promotions to advertisements.
document.title: campbell profit beats, but u.s. soup sales fall
lines_and_colors: campbell soup co  reported a higher-than-expected quarterly profit on monday and forecast full-year results at the top of its range after moving its focus from profit-sapping promotions to advertisements.
